snippet: Darius de Haas distinguishes himself by diving deep into a song and carrying it as far as it will let him.
abstract: Stephen Holden reviews performance by singer Darius de Haas at 54 Below.
lead_paragraph: Darius de Haas distinguishes himself by diving deep into a song and carrying it as far as it will let him.

headline.seo: Darius de Haas in ‘If Only for One Night’ at 54 Below,
headline.main: A Soul Singer Following in the Family Tradition
